exception.name: ErrorPukTemporarilyBlocked
exception.description: This exception is thrown by SE API method unblockPin in case the PUK is temporarily blocked.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorPukTemporarilyBlocked that is thrown by SE API method unblockPin in case the PUK is temporarily blocked.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when PUK is temporarily blocked due to failed attempts
specification.applicability: PIN unblock operations when PUK temporarily blocked
